summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the functionality of the ControlledGate abstraction and all derived controlled quantum gates, covering parameter handling, inverses, global phase, multi‑control configurations, open‑control unrolling, and matrix correctness.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of controlled gate implementations in a quantum computing framework, ensuring that complex gate constructions behave as expected across a wide range of scenarios and edge cases.
